titleStmt.title: An exact and true relation of the dangerous and bloudy fight, betweene His Majesties armie, and the Parliaments forces, neere Kyneton in the countie of Warwick, the 23 of this instant October sent in a letter to Iohn Pym, Esquire, a member of the House of Commons : which letter was signed by : Denzell Hollis, Ph. Stapleton, Tho. Ballard, William Balfour, Io., Meldrum, Charles Pym, who were then present.

An exact and true relation of the dangerous and bloudy fight, betweene His Majesties armie, and the Parliaments forces, neere Kyneton in the countie of Warwick, the 23 of this instant October sent in a letter to Iohn Pym, Esquire, a member of the House of Commons : which letter was signed by : Denzell Hollis, Ph. Stapleton, Tho. Ballard, William Balfour, Io., Meldrum, Charles Pym, who were then present.
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.
Pym, Charles, Sir, d. ca. 1672.
Stapleton, Philip, Sir, 1603-1647.
Ballard, Thomas, Lieutenant Colonel to the Lord Grandison.
Balfour, William, Sir, d. 1660.
Meldrum, John, Sir, d. 1645.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
